info.name: Shrek Trading Platform API
info.description: API endpoints for testing the Shrek trading platform's backtesting functionality

request.description: Check if the backend API is running

body.raw:
{
    "symbols": ["AAPL", "MSFT"],
    "start_date": "2023-01-01",
    "end_date": "2023-12-31",
    "initial_capital": 100000,
    "agent_type": "customizable_agent",
    "use_mock_data": true,
    "strategy_params": {
        "momentum_enabled": true,
        "mean_reversion_enabled": true,
        "breakout_enabled": false,
        "volatility_enabled": false,
        "momentum_weight": 0.5,
        "mean_reversion_weight": 0.5,
        "breakout_weight": 0,
        "volatility_weight": 0,
        "rsi_period": 14,
        "rsi_overbought": 70,
        "rsi_oversold": 30,
        "ma_fast_period": 10,
        "ma_slow_period": 30,
        "bb_period": 20,
        "bb_std": 2,
        "max_position_size": 2,
        "stop_loss": 5,
        "take_profit": 10,
        "trailing_stop": true
    }
}

request.description: Run a backtest with customizable parameters

body.raw:
{
    "symbols": ["AAPL", "MSFT"],
    "start_date": "2023-01-01",
    "end_date": "2023-12-31",
    "initial_capital": 100000,
    "agent_type": "customizable_agent",
    "use_mock_data": false,
    "strategy_params": {
        "momentum_enabled": true,
        "mean_reversion_enabled": true,
        "breakout_enabled": false,
        "volatility_enabled": false,
        "momentum_weight": 0.5,
        "mean_reversion_weight": 0.5,
        "breakout_weight": 0,
        "volatility_weight": 0,
        "rsi_period": 14,
        "rsi_overbought": 70,
        "rsi_oversold": 30,
        "ma_fast_period": 10,
        "ma_slow_period": 30,
        "bb_period": 20,
        "bb_std": 2,
        "max_position_size": 2,
        "stop_loss": 5,
        "take_profit": 10,
        "trailing_stop": true
    }
}

request.description: Run a backtest with real market data (no mock data)

body.raw:
{
    "strategy": {
        "name": "Momentum RSI Strategy",
        "description": "A strategy that combines momentum and RSI indicators",
        "agent_type": "customizable_agent",
        "parameters": {
            "momentum_enabled": true,
            "mean_reversion_enabled": true,
            "breakout_enabled": false,
            "volatility_enabled": false,
            "momentum_weight": 0.5,
            "mean_reversion_weight": 0.5,
            "breakout_weight": 0,
            "volatility_weight": 0,
            "rsi_period": 14,
            "rsi_overbought": 70,
            "rsi_oversold": 30,
            "ma_fast_period": 10,
            "ma_slow_period": 30,
            "max_position_size": 2,
            "stop_loss": 5,
            "take_profit": 10,
            "trailing_stop": true
        },
        "performance": {
            "total_return": 15.2,
            "sharpe_ratio": 1.3,
            "max_drawdown": 8.5,
            "win_rate": 55.0
        },
        "test_period": {
            "start_date": "2023-01-01",
            "end_date": "2023-12-31",
            "symbols": ["AAPL", "MSFT"]
        }
    }
}

request.description: Get a specific strategy by ID
